content: If it takes 3 minutes to boil 1 egg, how long does it take to boil 4 eggs?
subject: Thinking Skills
explanation: You can boil all 4 eggs at the same time, so it still takes 3 minutes.

content: Sarah is taller than Mike. Mike is taller than Jenny. Who is the shortest?
subject: Thinking Skills
explanation: If Sarah > Mike > Jenny, then Jenny is shortest.
